descriptionHtml:
[b][size=3]Use this patch if you want to play Enderal with the famous Stormlord armor. Enjoy! :D

[/size][/b][size=4][b]REQUIREMENTS:[/b][/size]
[size=3]- [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/77868/?]Enderal[/url]
[/size][size=3]- [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/40216/?]Stormlord Armor[/url] From [/size][size=5][url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/users/3054798/?]gechbal[/url][/size]

[size=4][b]INSTALLATION: [/b][/size]
[size=3]- Drag and drop in Data folder, replace the original Stormlord.esp file from Stormlord armor with the .esp comes from this patch.

[/size][b][size=4]CREDITS: [/size][/b]
[size=3]- All credits goes to the author of this armor set:[/size][size=5] [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/users/3054798/?]gechbal[/url][/size]
author: ndnuzik
